text: Santa Ana is the capital of Santa Ana Department. It is the second largest city in El Salvador by population, after the capital San Salvador. It is 64 kilometers (km) northwest of San Salvador, the nation's capital. About 380,000 people live there. The main industry is coffee bean. The city has many old buildings such as Catedral de Santa Ana (The Cathedral of Saint Anne), Alcald√≠a Municipal de Santa Ana (Santa Ana City Hall) and the Teatro de Santa Ana (Santa Ana Theater). Category:Cities in El Salvador
title: Santa Ana, El Salvador
